description:
Trux is friends with Teo, who for last year or so have been working a high wire job, traveling much of the country.
Trux's has a girlfriend here in Austin, and so the two of them try to come down to visit as often as they can. We tried to have him come on over on his own, but he had no wheels on a couple visits.
This visit, Teo had a car, so he brought Trux and his girlfriend out to the studio. I of course asked him if he had his bush, and he said it was all there. As you can tell, like most of the straight guys, they think whiskers count as full-on bush.
I think Trux is getting wore out from the job, and wants to move full-time to Austin, and I think he was hoping to pick-up some extra cash for moving expenses, or even do some full guy-on-guy- work if the pay was right.
He seemed pretty nervous to start with, but once he got his cock hard, he turns into quite the show man. He has a nice long cock on him, and kind of has a rough-trade vibe about him. Put a few beers in him and he might let you suck him off, or sit on his cock.
Trux says he jerks-off in the shower, so I had him bust upright. Nice thick load shoots out!
title: Trux - Solo
